title: My Best Girl
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2ShHh77

by MurasakibaraAoi

Tony can count with one hand the number of things he has wanted in his life, but has never been able to get.
His father’s love and affection was the first thing.
Then, there was Mary Fitzpatrick.

 

As time went by, Peter looked less like Mary and more like Richard. This is something that anyone who had known the Parkers could confirm.
For all Tony cared, genetics could go suck it.
She could grow to have a Parker’s nose and jawline. Peter could have their ears and their horrible taste in baseball teams, could go change her eyes from Mary’s brown to Richard’s green, and none of that would matter. At the end of the day, she was still Tony’s.

Words: 8043, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

blog.description: My place to vent. Unabashed echo chamber. Not here to debate, just here to hate. Don’t @ me. For positive, toenail-free MCU posts click <a href="https://www.tumblr.com/blog/team-everyone-but-toenail/">here<a/>

tags: great doesnt look like a word anymore
summary:
Peter Parker: with great power comes great-
Toenail: *shoots Sam point blank in the chest.
Peter: with great power comes...
body:
Peter Parker: with great power comes great-

Toenail: *shoots Sam point blank in the chest.

Peter: with great power comes GREAT-

Toenail: *blows off Bucky’s arm and shoots him in the back*

Peter: with GREAT POWER comes great-

Toenail: *shoots Steve in the gut point blank*

Peter: RESPONSIBILITY! WITH GREAT POWER COMES GREAT RESPONSIBILITY!!!

Toenail: oh yeah, that’s why I got those guys *points to the UN* They keep me in check. Very successfully, I might add.

blog.name: loveustarker
blog.title: 🌼LoveUStarker🌼
blog.description: Hello everyone you can call me Tae. I am no stranger to ships or writing fanfiction. If anyone is a fan of 1D still, I wrote a lot of stories about Louis and Harry. You can read them on my A03 or on here @LoveUStylinson. Anyways, I have always been a fan of Marvel movies but it wasn't until i watched Spider-man H that I shipped anyone. That's when I fell down head first into the starker rabbit hole, and alas here I am. Expect some fics soon! Here is my A03 for my(Future) Starker fics: https://archiveofourown.org/users/Love_Starker/profile Here is my A03 for my 1D followers: https://archiveofourown.org/users/Love_Stylinson/profile

body:
🕐📝Post scheduling🕐📝

Hello everyone hope y’all having a good blessed up day. I just want to say thank you for all the likes on my lil stories. I forgot how good it feels to get compliments on my writing🥰

Alright I’m here to break down my post’n schedule. Because I’m in school it’s hard to find times to write but lucky for me I don’t have classes Tuesday and Thursday’s so those days are probably going to be my writing days. Which is also the best time to ask me to write anything specific for you, since I’m already in my writing headspace😊

My official posting days are going to be Sunday nights with the occasional Monday if I just completely forget to post the day before😂🤦🏽‍♀️

That also means Blue Sweater Pt. 2 will be posted this Sunday😉

summary: For the prompt thing “where did all these puppies come from?!” With irondad maybe 🙃
question: For the prompt thing “where did all these puppies come from?!” With irondad maybe 🙃
answer:
UhM yes yes ok let’s go

–

“Oh my god Nugget, no!” Peter yelled as he lunged forward and scooped up the small dog that was about to fall off of the couch.

He took the puppy and placed him along the nine other dogs in the pillow circle he’d created for them earlier. Peter stacked a couple more pillows and blankets on top of each other to ensure that the dogs couldn’t escape before letting out a hum of satisfaction.

Peter crouched down and patted one of the dogs heads, “Alright guys, I know you wanna run around and play but I need you to stay in this uh… fort. I can’t have you all running around the tower before Mr. Stark gets here, okay?” He smiled as the puppies rolled over one another and played with the toys that he’d provided for them.

“Mr. Stark has entered the tower and is coming up in the elevator. Approximate arrival time will be in 54 seconds.” FRIDAY’s voice spoke through the room, causing Peter to jump in excitement.

One of the puppies barked at the movement and Peter whipped around to shush it, “Shh! Don’t blow this for us!” He quietly yelled before running towards the elevator, stopping abruptly as it dinged.

Peter hastily leaned against the couch and put his hand on his hip in an attempt to look natural. He smiled as the doors opened, revealing Tony, “Heyyyy, Mr. Stark!”

Tony looked up from the tablet he held in his hand, the tired look on his face shifting brighter as he caught sight of Peter, “Hey kid, what’s up?” He asked as he walked over to the boy and ruffled his hair.

Peter ducked away with a laugh, “Oh nothing just being as normal as a mutated teenager can be- so howareyoudoing?” He asked quickly as Tony put down his tablet on the table.

Tony gave Peter a look, a questioning smile playing on his face, “Well… I’m a little tired and.. stressed, God, Pete I’m completely out of it.” He sighed, running a hand over his face.

Peter nodded along with his words, “Yeah.. I kind of figured that so I-” His sentence was interrupted by a high pitched bark.

Tony’s head snapped up at the sound and he stepped away from the table he was leaning against, “What was that?”

Peter opened his mouth to respond but was cut off by Tony as he neared the living room, “Where did all these puppies come from?!” He asked, staring in shock at the mass of dogs surrounded by pillows.

“I found a website that let’s you rent puppies for a day!” Peter explained as he ran forward, a smile glowing on his face, “They’re cute, right?” He asked as he bent down and picked one up, laughing when it licked his cheek.

“Wha- well, yeah they’re cute, kid. But why are they..?” Tony motioned towards the dogs and then around his living room.

Peter walked over to his mentor and gave him a little nudge towards the puppies, “I noticed that you were really stressed so I got you something that always makes me feel better. Usually I just look at pictures of dogs but this is so much better- oh my God look at them they’re literally the cutest, I-”

“Pete.” Tony stopped the kid, placing his hands on his shoulders, “You’re rambling.”

Heat shot into Peter’s face as his smile grew, “Ha, sorry. I was just really excited and.. nervous to show you, y'know because I didn’t know if you liked dogs or if you were- oh my God are you allergic to them, I didn’t-”

“Peter!” Tony laughed, “Don’t worry, I’m not allergic to dogs.” He reassured him before ruffling his curls again, smiling, “You’re a good kid. And these pups-” Tony bent down and scooped one up, “They’re just what I needed kid, thank you.”

Peter’s face lit up impossibly brighter at the man’s words. He laughed as Tony pulled him into a hug before pushing the kid into the pit of puppies.

Peter yelped in surprise as he fell onto the blankets before getting attacked by all of the dogs. Tony laughed as the dogs licked at his face and crawled over him, their little tails wagging.

“Mason, I swear to God!” Peter suddenly shouted as he grabbed one of the puppies that was trying to escape.

Tony stopped moving, at least four puppies still in his arms, “Mason?” He asked, staring at the dog Peter was holding.

Peter nodded, “Yeah, they all have names!” He held the dog in front of Tony’s face, “This is Mason, he’s been trying to escape all morning. That’s Nugget, he almost fell off of the couch earlier. This is Toothless, oh! That little white one is Cotton and that one is Cactus- he bites, and-” Peter rambled off all of the puppies names, including facts about the dog and what type of breed they were.

Tony watched as the kid talked about the puppies, the light in his eyes filling Tony’s chest with warmth. He smiled at the kid and for the first time in a long time, he felt completely content.

–

Oh this is definitely the SOFTEST thing I’ve ever written wOw you really just brought this side of me out

body:
Welcome To Prison (Starker)

Prison!AU where Tony is a prisoner.  He get a new cell-mate, whose innocent he intends on taking.  

Warnings: Implied rape.

You have been warned!!

Tony had been sleeping when the doors to his cell opened with the familiar buzzing noise, waking him up like an alarm.  He sat up in his bunk, wondering what was going on.  They never usually did cell checks at this time of the day.  He could see the correctional officer standing at his cell door.

“What’s going on?” Tony asked.

“You got a new cell-mate,” the officer replied, stepping back and allowing Tony’s new cell-mate through.  Tony wasn’t too pleased.  His last cell-mate had ended up in the infirmary many times, but then again, so had Tony.  Sharing a cell wasn’t the most glamorous part of prison.  Tony sighed.

“Parker, this is your cell.  And this friendly man here-” the officer glanced at Tony with a knowing smirk - that Tony definitely wasn’t the most friendly of prisoners. “-He’s your cell-mate.”

The young prisoner nodded, looking absolutely terrified.  He shuffled into the cell, glancing around at what would be his new living space indefinitely.  The correctional officer gave him a harsh shove, and then closed the cell door again.  “Play nice, Stark,” he said, leaving them alone.

The boy didn’t seem to want to look at Tony, but Tony couldn’t stop looking at him.  He was very young, very sexy, and so innocent-looking that Tony couldn’t possibly imagine the boy committing any crime other than being too fucking hot for his own good.  Tony stood up and held his hand out for the boy to shake. “Tony Stark,” he introduced himself calmly.

The younger man looked down at Tony’s hand and his gaze rose to meet Tony’s eyes.  He looked even more fearful than he had looked when entering the cell.  A shaky hand came up to shake Tony’s.  “I - I’m Peter.  Um, Peter Parker,” he mumbled, letting go of Tony’s hand almost immediately after shaking it.

“You nervous, Parker?” Tony asked, leaning against the bunk and smirking at Peter with a mischievous glint in his eyes. 

“N-nervous?” Peter asked, looking very uncomfortable.  “No.”

Tony stared at Peter, almost ravenously.  He wanted him.  And Tony always got what he wanted.  Guys like Peter were rare in this place, but they were always Tony’s favourite kind.  They were pure, they were clean, they were submissive.  They were easily manipulated.

“You should be,” Tony said, staying in the same position.  He smirked more when he saw Peter take an anxious step back towards the wall of the cell.  

“Will you… will I… which bunk shall I-” 

“-What did such a pretty boy like you do to land yourself in prison?” Tony interrupted, loving the way the boy’s face reddened at his words. 

“I’m… sorry?” Peter asked.

“What crime did you commit?  You may look like a good little boy, but you must have done something wrong to get in here.”

He watched as Peter looked down at his hands, seemingly ashamed of himself.  “I- well, I… I stole some stuff.  I’m not proud of myself.”

Tony raised his eyebrows.  “A thief, huh?” he said.

Peter nodded.  “Yeah, I- I guess so.”

“Don’t you wanna ask what I did?” Tony said, standing up straight again and taking a step towards Peter.  

“What did you do?” Peter asked quietly, trying to step back but hitting his back against the concrete wall. 

Tony was now inches away from Peter, and he couldn’t stop staring at those soft pink lips… 

“I killed a man,” Tony whispered in Peter’s ear, almost seductively.  He felt the boy shudder, and he couldn’t help smiling.  “But don’t worry, baby.  You’re too pretty to kill.”

Tony leaned back a little..  He brought his hand up to brush his thumb gently across Peter’s cheek, caressing his smooth skin softly and staring intently into his deep brown eyes.  Peter seemed to be frozen in place.  He was trembling, and his eyes glistened with tears that were threatening to escape.  Tony reached his other hand up to the top of the cell door, releasing a large white bed sheet.  The sheet dropped, covering the bars of the cell to give them some privacy.

“Do you know what it means when prisoners cover their cell door with a sheet?” Tony asked, rubbing his thumb over Peter’s cheek again.

“I- I don’t-”

“-It means they’re making love,” Tony murmured, using his free hand to grab Peter by the waist and pull him closer.  Tony breathed hotly against Peter’s ear and he was pretty sure that Peter was now crying.  “I’m going to make love to you, Parker.”

“Please don’t,” Peter managed to say, his voice desperate and strained.

“You don’t want that, hm?” Tony asked softly, biting gently on Peter’s ear and hearing a small whimper come from his trembling lips.

“No, I- I don’t.”

“That’s okay, sweetheart, we won’t do that,” Tony said, letting go of him.  Peter looked surprised, but mostly relieved.  Tony watched the boy wipe away his tears, and he smiled down at him.  Peter was truly beautiful.  Tony didn’t think he’d ever seen anyone so beautiful in his life. He let himself appreciate Peter’s beauty for a minute, before he grabbed him roughly.

“What’re you doing?” Peter gasped, trying to break free from Tony’s grasp but failing completely.

“I’m going to fuck you,” Tony growled, turning Peter around and throwing him down onto the bottom bunk with much more force than what was necessary.  “You don’t want to make love, so you’re getting fucked.  And you’re going to enjoy it for me, aren’t you?”

“Please,” Peter sobbed.  It was almost heart-breaking for Tony hear the boy beg so sweetly for him not to do it, but he knew he had to.  He had to make Peter his.  He had to make all of the other prisoners know that Peter was his.  He had to make Peter know that he belonged to someone now.

Tony leaned down, pushing his whole weight against Peter’s small body.  “You belong to me now, alright?  Shhh, it’s okay.  I won’t hurt you.  Shhh.” He placed his hand over Peter’s mouth, silencing him.  “That’s a good boy.”

Peter was staring up at Tony with tear-stained eyes, already looking completely broken.  Tony longed to see what he’d look like after.  He pressed a gentle kiss to Peter’s forehead and then slowly started to undress.

“Welcome to prison, baby.”

question: ok but imagine Peter P. showing Peter Q. "Just Dance" a game series literally made for dance-offs                                                                                                                                 (I love your blog btw!)
answer:
Peter Quill and the rest of the Guardians come for a visit at Avengers Tower. Both teams converse among themselves in the common area. Peter Parker enters the room and locks his eyes with Quill.

Peter P: Quill.

Peter Q: Parker.

Peter P: So after all this time the strings of destiny have woven us to meet again.

Peter Q: That’s right! And this place ain’t big enough for two Peters.

Drax: What do you mean? There is more than enough space to hold the required area for your bodies.

Clint: Just don’t say anything. If you interfere it’ll just make it worse.

Peter P: So how do you propose we settle this old timer?

Peter Q: Anyway, anywhere, anytime spider punk!

Peter P: Fine, but I don’t want to hear no crying. We’re going to settle this like men! Karen! Set up Manly Fight to the Death protocol!!!

Karen: Alright Peter, bringing up “Take on Me” by Ah ha! On Just Dance Unlimited 2019.

Tony: *sighs* That’s my kid all right.

Peter Q: *puts on aviator sunglasses * Let’s do this thing.

Gamora: And that’s my idiot.
